name: Roll the barrel
description:
Made for Rigid Jam 7 in a about 1h50mins.

Not actually playable.

The theme was "roll the dice" and the idea would be to have a western where you "roll the barrel" every time you reload, forcing you to have a different bullet every time.

Unfortunately didn't make the time to actually submit it to the jam and lost the time window. =p Rigidity was cool enough to let me make a late submission, thanks!

Resources used:

  • Cowboy sprites by bellow
  • Desert background by PWL
